MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:28pm. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:45pm on Monday, 12 October 2020
